s2.title: Releases Plan
s2.p: For future release plan about &XercesCName;, please refer to Releases Plan.

s2.title: Releases Archive
s2.p: For release information about &XercesCName; 2.1.0 or earlier, please refer to Releases Archive.

s2.title: Release Information of &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion;: February 7, 2003
s2.p: Here is the list of fixed bugzilla bugs that are resolved in this release, &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion;.

tr.td:
Schema Errata:
1. E2-9 Base64.
2. E2-12 gMonth.
3. E2-16 maxExclusive.
4. E2-23 seconds part shall have at least one digit after the dot if it appears.
5. E2-24 Duration 'T': allow SchemaDateTimeException be propogated to client.
6. E2-25 language.
Performance: Scanner Reorganization. Create XMLScannerResolver, WFXMLScanner, IGXMLScanner, DGXMLScanner, and SGXMLScanner.

Performance:
1. [Bug 13695] Performance problem with large text nodes and XMLFormatter.cpp.
2. Make getNextChar/peekNextChar inline.
3. Reduce instruction counts in XMLReader.
4. Do not call XMLString::stringLen in XMLString::indexOf.
5. Use existing QName in XMLElementDecl instead of creating a new one everytime.
6. Allow creating/setting of XMLAttr using a rawname (i.e. 'prefix:localpart').
7. Enable/disable calculation of src offset.
8. No need to use temporary buffer to hold namespace value in SAX2XMLReaderImpl.
9. Eliminate unnecessary condition in compareNString.
10. Use global buffer to eliminate repetitive memory creation/deletion

Performance:
1. DOM: call fParent.fOwnerDocument directly instead of fNode.getOwnerDocument.
2. Check for null string directly isntead of calling XMLString::stringLen.
3. New inline function XMLString::equals that simply returns true or false, use it instead of XMLString::compareString wherever applicable.
4. XERCES_XMLCH should not be classified as XMLRecognizer::OtherEncodings.
5. Pre uppercase the encodingString before calling encodingForName to avoid calling compareIString.
6. Use XMLRecognizer::Encodings enum to make new transcode, faster than comparing the encoding string every time.
7. Reduce some instruction counts in XMLUTF8Transcoder.
8. [Bug 13447] Using LocalFileFormatTarget with DOMWriter is very slow.
9. Define fGlobalDeclarations as an array of ValueVectorOf to avoid string comparison.
Schema Fix: bug with multiple attributes being validated by the same union type.
[Bug 14599] Metrowerks in support of CodeWarrior for Windows.
[Bug 16796] Possible out of bounds memory read in XMLRecognizer::basicEncodingProbe.
[Bug 16747] Parser loses ValidationScheme setting between parse attempts.
[Bug 16652] data from CDATA section is not passed for validation.
DOM L3: DOMTypeInfo and an associated test case.
[Bug 15787] Reduce array size to reduce memory footprint.
[Bug 13694]: Allow Xerces to write the BOM to XML files.
[Bug 16277] Readme should make note of threaded library problems in BCB6.
[Bug 16151] Memory leak in DTDScanner with ill-formed DTD declaration.
[Bug 13909] Use of non standard mbstowcs feature.
[Bug 5854] Patches and .spec file for rpm creation of 2.2.0.
[Bug 15371] Fix documentation. The default of schema processing shoud be false.
[Bug 15427] DOMWriter dose not flush the output stream.
New feature StandardUriConformant to force strict standard uri conformance.
[Bug 15590] BeOSDefs.hpp has wrong case in CVS.
[Bug 15608] IconvLCPTranscoder::transcode() is wrong at wcstombs() usage.
Added isDocumentAdopted API and recognize feature fgXercesUserAdoptsDOMDocument in DOMBuilder::getFeature/canSetFeature.
New public api to various parsers to return the src offset within the input source.
Schema: get/set methods to see if the represented type is anonymous.
[Bug 13438] Mismatched new[]/delete in template vector class. Added new abstract base class BaseRefVectorOf from which both RefVectorOf and the new class RefArrayVectorOf inherit from it.
New Regx functionality - tokenize and replace.
[Bug 14805] Mac OS transcoder should return pointer to zero length string (rather than NULL) on receipt of zero length input.
Validating Schema Float/Double in value space. Converting out-of-bound value into special values.
NLS: DOMWriter should use message loader to load message instead of using hardcoded static stirng.
Fix: for file protocol, need to manually replace any character reference %xx first.
[Bug 12490] Patches required to build Xerces-C++ on BeOS R5.
[Bug 13804] Update build and installation docs for cygwin.
[Bug 14960] Opened up interface to expose user defined and built in registries.
Gareth Reakes and Peter A. Volchek
[Bug 12188] Create NMTOKEN, ID, IDREF, ENTITY, NAME, NCNAME with appropriate base types. Some reordering of creation was required where dependencies resulted.
[Bug 12238] Attributes without type declarations should be validated using AnySimpleTypeValidator, not the string validator.

Namespace Check:
1. xmlns:a="" where namespace URI is null is not valid.
2. xmlns:doc where xmlns is used as element prefix is not valid.
3. xmlns:xmlns where xmlns is used as prefix is not valid.
4. xmlns:xml="a" where xml is used as prefix but URI does not match the xml uri (http://www.w3.org/XML/1999/namespace) is not valid.
5. if validation is on, attribute values declared to be of types ID, IDREF(S), ENTITY(IES), and NOTATION are also Names, and thus should be colon-free.
Add autodetection of MSVC++ version in packageBinaries.pl.
390: support record-oriented MVS datasets with the DOM Level 3 serialization APIs.
Fixed bug in Token::analyzeFirstCharacter so that . matches new line with head character optimisation enabled.
DOM L3: isId, setIdAttribute, setIdAttributeNS and setIdAttributeNode.
Schema Fix: validate content as a whole against pattern.
Update ThreadTest to use DOMWriter to dump DOM.
[Bug 13487] Linux runs on many non-i386 platforms.
Problems using make tarball under linux.
[Bug 14612] GCCDefs clashes with cygwin's string.h for stricmp and strnicmp.
[Bug 14265] Access violation with Null systemId/publicId in DTDScanner.
[Bug 14528] Encounters of the end tag "]]>" are ignored.
[Bug 14260] MacOSUnicodeConverter::upperCase() passes wrong arguments to Carbon function.
Update Mac OS build for compatiblity with namespace additions.
DOM Message: make use of the non-standard extension DOMImplementation::loadDOMExceptionMsg to load the default error text message for the correspond Exception Code.
DOM Message: introduce a new message domain, XMLDOMMsg, for DOM Messages.
New feature XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize(const char* const locale) to set the locale for message loader.
[Bug 13641] compiler-generated copy-constructor for QName doesn't do the right thing.
Modify DOMPrint to accept a file name as a parameter.
Support for Linux/390 which is big endian.
[Bug 13640] Getter methods not public in DecimalDatatypeValidator.
[Bug 13293] Schema ID validation can fail depending on declaration ordering.
[Bug 13639] Failure to parse xsi:schemaLocation attribute value correctly.
[Bug 13494] use unsigned instead of signed in TraverseSchema.cpp.
Xlat: To generate icu resource file (in text) for error message.
[Bug 12547] Xerces C++ 2.1 fails to build on Linux 64 bits arch with -tlinux.
[Bug 13073] GeneralAttributeCheck.cpp : compilation fails with Sun C++ 4.2 on Solaris2.7 system.
DOM L3: Add const to isSameNode, isEqualNode, compareTreePosition.
Gareth Reakes, Thomas Ford and Tinny Ng
OS390 Performance Enhancement: instead of calling isPosixOn everytime, store the information in a static flag during initialization.
Infinite loop for malformed xml (e.g. simple has "XXXX") w/ setexitonfirstfatal(false).
[Bug 12369] invalid output from DOMWriter using MemBufFormatTarget.
Add export directives for Mac OS path utility routines .
[Bug 12279] Makefiles contain tabs causing "commands commence" error.
[Bug 12897] System ID is missing inside DOCTYPE.
Identity Constraint: handle case of recursive elements.
